IIR Retention
The inspection records will be filed in a separate file and for purposes of meeting
IRC 6103(p)(4)
requirements, will be retained for a period of five full years (even if reviewed by the IRS).Â  At that time the inspection records may be destroyed.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section B - Federal Tax Information (FTI) Match: Safeguarding
